lead_paragraph: JACOBSON--Janet. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Janet Jacobson, beloved daughter of Dr. Julius H. Jacobson and step-daughter of Mrs. Joan L. Jacobson, both dedicated philanthropists who help strengthen the fabric of the New York Jewish community. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Julius and Joan; Janet's husband, James H. Wildman; sisters, Jeannie and Wendy; brother, William; her step-grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; John S. Ruskay, Executive VP & CEO
